discourse_list.title: Proposal to make UNI LPs able to vote

content.content: I’m not a blockchain programmer but this would seem like an important discussion to give people like me who are currently providing eth-uni liquidity the ability to vote. Also considering the next liquidity pools looks like eth-uni is in the lead even more of a pressing issue when there’s millions of UNI locked in liquidity.
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing to make UNI LPs able to vote and is explaining why it is important for people who are currently providing eth-uni liquidity. A third party is giving constructive criticism by suggesting that the proposal needs more details and asking questions about how it would work.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Hi there Joncatch, Please use this existing thread to continue the conversation about this: Allow UNI tokens locked in pools to vote. Thank you
